page.title: 09Sharnbrook at Work & Play
page.content: We surveyed 90 families and in three of them the man had retired. 15 ladies worked full time and 42 had part time jobs. The men were lucky - no one we spoke to was unemployed. Many people showed concern for their health & fitness and 65% of our sample took part in sports activities; 80% of them played team games like hockey or football. Others preferred jogging, squash or golf. Apart from ice skating and swimming, there are facilities in Sharnbrook for most sports activities. Only 30% of our sample attended classes at the Sharnbrook Community College either for recreational or educational activities. Young children are well provided with clubs - many children are involved in them for two or three evenings a week. There are youth clubs for teenagers.
